Package com.ae2dms.controller

Class MarkLogWindowController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.controller.MarkLogWindowController
public class MarkLogWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
The project of AE2DMS Coursework of Yizirui FANG 20127091

Package: com.ae2dms.controller

This class is the controller to the view page, mark log window. This page will pop up when the user completed a certain game map

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void initialize()
    initialize the game completion page or the mark log page.
    void onSaveAndBackClicked()
    save the users' game record on the specific map gameEngine.mapSetName, the moves count movesCount, and the user-inputted user name String userName = inputName.getText() in the serialized file, ranking.json in the rank directory of project resources path.

  • Constructor Details

    • MarkLogWindowController

      public MarkLogWindowController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      initialize the game completion page or the mark log page. Present the completed map name, the moves count to complete this map, and text field to prompt user to enter a user name

    • onSaveAndBackClicked

      public void onSaveAndBackClicked() throws java.io.IOException
      save the users' game record on the specific map gameEngine.mapSetName, the moves count movesCount, and the user-inputted user name String userName = inputName.getText() in the serialized file, ranking.json in the rank directory of project resources path.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
